website_summaries.verdict: Impressive catnip-enhanced cat toys for any pampered feline, and a great gift that is sure to be appreciated by both pet and owner.
pros: An adorable set of 8 cat toys that resemble sushi, and comes in a bento-like box that's perfect for gift-giving
Toys are made with safe, quality materials and organic catnip
Set includes rattle and crinkle toys that catch cats' attention
cons: Higher-priced than other options on our list, but about what you'd expect for the quality and cute design

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these!
customer_reviews.text: Cats absolutely love these. It's a kitty madhouse right now! These are so adorable, absolutely love them. I got a second box for a friend, to give to her for her birthday, and I think she is going to love them.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: The only sushi I let in my home
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these little sushi toys so much that she bats them vigorously around the house like a pro soccer player. One day there will be four of these scattered around the room and the next day I can't find a single one. Not sure if she is hiding them from me or herself. I found one in my bed once which I will continue to take as a sign that she might love me and isn't waiting to kill me in my sleep. These are relatively small so best not to keep small children or big pets unattended around them. Choking hazard is a possibility.
customer_reviews.author: bunn3h

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them and they’re so cute!
customer_reviews.text: My cats went CRAZY over these and they tore them out of the box. They must have a strong catnip flavor. Both cats crazily played with them for a long time right out of the box. They continue to bat them around and chase them across he hardwood. Some of the pieces have small, quiet bells in them. And they are SO CUTE!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: 2 yr old picky cat LOVES these toys!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend’s two-year-old cat absolutely LOVES these! She was recently spayed and so we were wondering if she’d still react to catnip the same way, and she’s always been picky about catnip. She has always liked catnip to be really strong, and she goes bonkers with these cute sushi toys! She even rubs her face on the box they came in! The sushi rolls are about the size of a golf ball, and the rectangular ones are about the size of a bar of soap. Some come with additional incentives inside such as a little bell and/or crinkle paper.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: adored by 5 out of 5 cats young and old
customer_reviews.text: obsessed. everyone from.our arthritic 17 year old, and quiet 14 year old through to our 2/3 year olds. and my friends cat rrcovering from kidney failure ---- all went nuts. save the box. rescuing them from the container is half the fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: TexasTripletMom

customer_reviews.title: Quality is in the details
customer_reviews.text: The price is a little high on these, but the quality really is beautiful. Each piece does something a little different, and at night I’ll catch my cat batting them around the floor. I’ve already found them hidden in each of her beds/boxes and other play places. They’re a great size and come so adorably packaged. If you’re looking to spoil your cat it really is one of the nicer cat toys out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cipollone

customer_reviews.title: What an adorable idea for a cat toy!
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies LOVE these!! The packaging and the toy is so cute!!!!! -edit-7/15/18 The sushi balls make gentle and pleasant rattles. Some cat toys are too noisy for cats. This one is PERFECT. I had to throw the nigiris out eventually because one of my cats starting eating it...(wtf 0.0) I bought these on 10.10.17 so they are very durable toys. Just shave off the felt fuzz with scissors!
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Love thank you Shane Dawson for the video and Amazon, and the seller of this product
customer_reviews.text: my cat loves this so much!! i watched a shane dawson video reviewing cat toys and i had to get this toy for my orange Cat!! my cat is 22 and loves this product!! packaging is amazing and great quality fast shipping!! if you have a cat it's such a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: laura Rebecca Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy, perfect quality
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loved these she carries the small rounds around with her and plays fetch with them. They're high quality and have a quiet rattle so they don't wake the kids (unlike other bell toys). All in all I love these and bought extra for us and some for a friend's new kitty too.
customer_reviews.author: MN Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Fun plush toys for cats to chase & kick
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in anticipation of picking up my new kitten and they did not disappoint! They are plush and adorable. Each piece is slightly different- some have crinkle material inside and some don’t so that no matter what your cat is in the mood for there is a piece of sushi for them! The packaging was adorable.
customer_reviews.author: HLJ73

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't want to see their cat enjoying sushi? These are very high quality and come in boxes I'm hesitant to throw away because they're so nice. My cat loves these toys and goes bonkers when I dig them out from under the couch or refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Rational Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I waited so long for this to be back in stock and it was worth it. The cats love them! The nigiri crinkles and the sushi jingles. My newest baby wouldn’t event let me take a picture of the set without digging into the toys.
customer_reviews.author: BettyBean

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat !!
customer_reviews.text: Yes its alittle pricey.... but worth it.. My cat tears apart all her stuffed toys I have brought through the years...Its been a few weeks now,and still in one piece !!! They came in a cute gift box too..
customer_reviews.author: Mavis Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable sushi for your cat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these toys!! She can be kind of finicky, but as soon as I opened the box she was all over these! I find them in all sorts of weird corners in the house, since she loves to hide them, but she also plays with them by batting them around (especially the sushi with bells inside). The nigiri she just likes to cuddle with. Also they're really nicely made! I don't know if I'd have bought the full set at full price, but if you can get them on sale I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Kitten Magnet
customer_reviews.text: We named our Kitten Musubi, so sushi themed toys was a must. The quality and design of the toys are perfect. The box it comes in is super cute. My Kitten absolutely loves and is obsessed with every piece. Recommended for anyone with cats or kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Saphirrebloo

customer_reviews.title: Incredible toys
customer_reviews.text: These toys are incredible. They are high quality and my cats love them. They are also very cute and purr-fectly sized for my cats to carry them around in their mouths. They espescially love the rolls and tend to bring their favorite to bed with them. I am already planning to buy a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: ask my cat
customer_reviews.text: ole! the international cat soccer tournament exploded in an uproar of paws throughout my house when i dropped the first sushi ball on the field. or was this a rugby scrum? no matter. ten paws up.
customer_reviews.author: lionsroarcatsdonot

customer_reviews.title: The sushi comes in cardboard not wood and without chopsticks.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this just wish the sushi came in an actual wood box with real chopsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Cats of all ages love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as presents for furry family members for Christmas - two 3 1/2 month old kittens and one 3 year old cat. Both LOVED THEM. They can smell the catnip inside and the crinkle paper / balls inside also help keep their interest. The small ones are the perfect size for kittens, and the larger ones are great for full grown cats.
customer_reviews.author: Sally R.

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and my cats LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautifully packaged and presented. I am beyond happy with this. My cats absolutely went nuts for it.
customer_reviews.author: New York, NY

customer_reviews.title: The cats love them and it is adorable to see them pick ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting this just for the sheer fact that they were sushi pieces and that the cats wouldn't go for them much. The cats love them and it is adorable to see them pick up the sashimi pieces in their mouths and run with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Plowman

customer_reviews.title: Underestimated!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little expensive but was so worth it, my picky cat tore the box open herself to play with them! Must use as directed though, give one or two toys at once then put them away until next play time but she got into them so fast it was too late to read it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these
customer_reviews.text: Cats love them, still intact 2 months later and cats still playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: MattEnge

customer_reviews.title: Cats Enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: I'm told the cats enjoyed these gifts. Owners found the items to be well made and were amused by the theme/box.
customer_reviews.author: rainydaysunset

customer_reviews.title: Best cat gift ever
customer_reviews.text: The cat went ga-ga over it. Fast shipment and packaged beautifully!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise R

customer_reviews.title: Wounderful.
customer_reviews.text: The cats loves them, they get drug al over the house. Plus they are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Cats are obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: The cats were rubbing all over the Amazon box before we even opened it haha! That’s how awesome these catnip toys are!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Lovee
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Pretty good size for my Maine coon too! ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Farrah

customer_reviews.title: and I enjoy watching her
customer_reviews.text: What a charming and realistic sushi set. My kitten loves playing with them, and I enjoy watching her. Great gift idea as well!
customer_reviews.author: jill goldin

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, awesome packaging and presentation! Wish it came with some small chopsticks but that’s just an extra thought.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Cat loved this toy and scattered sushi around the room.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth N. Motter

customer_reviews.title: There is no catnip in my set.
customer_reviews.text: I'm with other reviewers who stated their cat had no interest in these and they seemed to have NO catnip in them! I could not smell catnip at all and the cats sniffed them and walked away. I have one older male cat and a young female cat and they both go nuts over fresh catnip from the garden, and dried catnip stuffed into a baby sock, etc. I think there are some defective sets out there, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: amy n

customer_reviews.title: Not only for cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved the catnip and after is no longer smelled, the cute look still makes a great conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Doppelfeld

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats really enjoyed the toys.. but only for FOUR days & they were destroyed. Material disintegrates.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 cats would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My cat always prefers trash vs toys but this toy has finally ended her relationship with garbage. She is in love with it and has dumped her old trash toys (literally). Also, my roommate's cat has stolen a few as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: For cats with class!
customer_reviews.text: I backed these on Kickstarter (received the four-piece nigiri set) and gave them to my kitties for Christmas. First off, the packaging was beautiful. It really feels like a high-end sushi set! And once you slide off the box wrapper and open it, you find that they're even cuter than their pictures. The detailing on the nigiri is superb, and the quality is definitely there. Our cats can be a little rough on toys, and these are holding up very well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Nyanko

customer_reviews.title: Now I want sushi!
customer_reviews.text: I also backed this on Kickstarter and finally received them. I would not be happier! They are realistic, great quality and are holding up to the abuse of my cats wonderfully. With a 20 pound mainecoon and a teething 9 month old kitten, they need to be pretty durable. These do not disappoint! I need to get the other part of the set now. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bost

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the toys is excellent and the packaging really makes you feel like you ...
customer_reviews.text: I backed this project on Kickstarter and was very excited to receive my 8 pc set today. The quality of the toys is excellent and the packaging really makes you feel like you have received something special. My cat came to investigate while I was opening the packaging and once open starting playing with the prawn Nigri. Top quality cat toy.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Catnip infused?  Not mine.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to be a negative ninny but contacting the creator of these toys is quite difficult. Therefore, I need to place a comment here. I backed this project on Kickstarter believing these toys would be "catnip infused", and with five cats, was quite excited. When they arrived and placed them on the floor, n-o-t-h-i-n-g. The cats totally ignored each and every one. If there is catnip involved, my toys didn't get any. Quality control? I have no idea. The toys are well made and appear durable. Catnip infused? Not mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cats love sushi!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Christmas morning for our cats. They were opened an hour ago and the cats are still rolling on them. Each piece is beautifully crafted and look amazingly realistic. Very very pleased. Highly recommend as a gift for your favorite feline or feline owner!
customer_reviews.author: K. Zabell

customer_reviews.title: The best catnip available!
customer_reviews.text: I was a Kickstarter supporter and out of over 20 backed projects this was the simplest AND the best. Delivered in time for Christmas (like our kitties would know) and by far the best catnip toys they got. We opened the boxes and one came running and our other one woke up and wouldn't leave us alone. These have been the best catnip toys we have ever gotten for our little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying this directly from the seller and could not be more pleased. This sushi set is absolutely adorable and so well made. I would also like to mention the wonderful customer service. There was a mixup with the shipping when I ordered a set for my friend and the owner not only fixed the issue, but also really went above and beyond. You will not be disappointed if you order these cat toys.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My Kitty's Favorite Toy Ever!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I showed my cat the box, she went nuts. Rubbing, sniffing, cuddling, and even protecting it. Once I opened it up, she spent the entire afternoon in a state of absolute bliss. My kitty normally is not a fan of catnip or tiny toys, but she fell head over heels for this sushi! I would encourage any cat owner to share this with their baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cat went crazy for them
customer_reviews.text: My cat went crazy for these! Especially when right out of the box, absolutely nuts. It's so cute to see him munch on the sushi pieces. I wish they would restock!
customer_reviews.author: buffalobill

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I backed this on Kickstarter and received the items today. My cats started playing with them right out of the box! They had received other toys the night before, and they haven't touched those. Excellent cat toys; I'm glad I supported the project and got the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Turner

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: I backed these on Kickstarter and I have to say, my cat BooBoo just loves them. They are well-made and can sustain my cat's attacks on them. I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: I backed the Cat Sushi on Kickstarter and got them ...
customer_reviews.text: I backed the Cat Sushi on Kickstarter and got them last evening. My cat kept me awake about half the night playing with them - usually he looses interest in toys after about 2 hours. Really cute idea that entertains!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cat toys
customer_reviews.text: Backed on Kickstarter and it arrived today. My cat was sniffing the package before I even opened the box. Quality toys and great packing. A must if your cat loves catnip
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bathurst

customer_reviews.title: Best cat nip toys ever !
customer_reviews.text: My cats are going nuts for these cat toys !! The most High Quality cat nip toys I've ever seen or purchased 😻
customer_reviews.author: jeyt

product_meta.title: munchiecat Sushi Toys for Cats, Kittens Catnip Toy Crinkle Paper Bells Rattle Set in Bento Style Box, Maki and Nigiri (8-pc)
feature_bullets: CATS LOVE SUSHI TOO! Beautiful cat toys with lots of variety, this sushi set will stimulate your kitty's natural instincts to explore and play. Treat your furry friend to a quality toy set that even their humans will love =^..^=

PLUSH, NON-TOXIC, PET-SAFE MATERIALS - Munchiecat’s toys are thoughtfully made using non-toxic, pet-safe materials so you can feel good about offering them to your furry friend. Contrary to popular cat toys like cat wands, we stay away from decorative strings, feathers, or small parts that can break off and cause choking hazards. Our simple designs are safe and durable.

KEEPS YOUR CAT HEALTHY - This 8-Pc Sushi Deluxe gift set is perfectly sized for batting and carrying. Includes (4) Nigiri Sushi 1.5 x 3 inches, and (4) Maki Sushi 1.5 x 1.5 inches. Your cats will love to pounce on their sushi "prey"! Our toys are lightweight and soft so your cats can easily carry them around. They're made in small batches to ensure freshness and quality, with ultra-soft minky fabric, polyester fiber, organic catnip, crinkle paper and bells securely sewn inside.
BEAUTIFUL PACKAGING MAKES A GREAT GIFT - This catnip toy set comes in a bamboo-print Bento-style gift box and is the puuurfect gift for your furry friend and makes a great cat lovers gift =^..^=

TWO PAWS UP - We know just how finicky felines can be. Each cat has their own unique preference for toys. If your kitty doesn't absolutely LOVE their new sushi toys and meowing for more, we will refund your money, no questions asked!
